StaticSkill.DiscoveryMessage: The night sky here in the woods is beautiful. Away from the lights of the town, you can see thousands of stars. Ignoring the couples around you, you gaze up at them; astrology may not be the greatest source of magic around, but perhaps it can still provide some inspiration? Let's see... The moon is in the seventh house... Jupiter is aligned with Mars... which suggests that... Hmm. Thinking back on your training, you see that suggests that "Peace will guide our planet, love will rule the stars." Psh. Never gonna happen, at least not in this city. Unless... unless you were to help things along, convince your opponents to give peace a chance...
StaticSkill.Description: War - what is it good for? Putting you at risk of being turned into clothing, that's what! And other than perpetuating the cycle of violence, what can you do? Some have tried creating pets, or immobilizing their attackers in some way, but you have a revolutionary idea: free their minds instead. A real solution! Once they won't want to make anyone into anything anyhow, you know that when you talk about destruction, you just know that you can count the victim of this spell out. Yeah - it'll be all right indeed.
